overview: Assuming he is marrying a wealthy girl, Peter Foley passes a fraudulent check. To save him from jail, Julia Barry poses as his wife. Peter is actually in love with Alice Blake. He encounters complications with motorcycle cop Bull, who is engaged to Julia. A friend of Alice adds to the mix-up. All wind up snowbound together in a mountain lodge.
tagline: IMPRISONED IN A MOUNTAIN LODGE BY A BLIZZARD THREE COUPLES FIND THAT CUPID IS ON THE JOB
title: Snowbound
